response.original_title: The Foothills of the Allegheny Plateau
response.overview: Everson staged the films in Georgia, Mississippi, and Ohio (the first three films are named for those places’ state birds), inviting family members to “look” for birds.  Presented from winter into early spring, the exhibition brings brightness to winter days in the park and leads us to the season when birds start to sing again in New York and the park comes alive.
response.title: The Foothills of the Allegheny Plateau
